0000111010011010 0010000010101000 1 -> sum: 0010111101000011, cout: 0
1111011111110000 1011011100110110 0 -> sum: 1010111100100110, cout: 1

1010101111010000 1010010010000011 1 -> sum: 0101000001010100, cout: 1
0000011100001000 0100111001001101 0 -> sum: 0101010101010101, cout: 0
0000001110001100 0101001001010011 1 -> sum: 0101010111100000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
